page.title: 05RECREATION
page.content: In our area recreation for the public includes Bromborough golfcourse, playing fields and a garden nursery. The name of the nursery is Raby Plant Nurseries.They own 10 acres of land and dont get many customers. We asked 40 children what they liked to do in their leisure time.The best things were T.V.and playing on computers. Here is a list of the games and of how many people play them. Bulldogs 16 Polo 1 Swingball 1 Hide & Seek 14 Tick 4 Shooting down the lines 4. The adults in our area liked reading best for indoor leisure & walking best for outdoor leisure.Out of 12 adults 11 of them used to go to the cinema when they were young. We found that adults like reading best and computers the worst.It was vice_versa with children.
